report.title: Survey routes with GeoJSON
report.description: Route samples with standardised filtering parameters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf ON snf.id=s.id LEFT JOIN locations l on s.location_ids @> ARRAY[l.id] AND l.location_type_id=15 #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND s.parent_sample_id IS NULL #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available
